upgrades.changelog:
Bug Fixes:
* (v3.01) shift manufacturerID from 0x0086 to 0x0371.
* (v3.04) Introduces ability to calibrate shutter travel time via Parameter 36.
* (v3.04) Update SDK to use v6.81.03.
* (v3.05)Resolves hardware freeze or lockup.
* (v3.06)Adds independent up/down timing via Parameter 51 and 52 for motors with different up/down speeds.

*Note - Due to significant changes from v2.XX to v3.07, you must exclude and re-include the Nano Shutter.
